name: The Sims 4: Get Famous
storyline:
Rise to stardom as an actor or influencer and navigate the wild turns of wealth and fame. Audition for career-making roles, attend wardrobe fittings, buy a mega mansion & cruise through Del Sol Valley in style.

The famous life was made for your Sims, so show off your fab celebrity lifestyle.

Embark on a glamorous career path and face the challenges that come with being a pop culture icon.

Audition for commercial gigs or land a breakout role in the latest blockbuster.

Score a legendary diamond on Starlight Boulevard with your Sim's name on it, and you'll be the talk of the town in no time.

Go from extravagant set costumes to chic streetwear as you strut down Starlight Boulevard.
summary: Reach for the stars and rise to celebrity status with The Sims 4: Get Famous. Build your stardom as you pursue an acting career, become an A-lister, and guide your Sims down the unpredictable path to fame. From the studio lot to VIP parties, you choose how your Sims can gain worldwide acclaim. Customize and show off your celebrity style, and decorate your Sims' luxury house on the hills with over-the-top accessories like a solid-gold toilet. Get ready to shine bright in the spotlight and live your best celebrity life.
